name: Crab
description: A small, hard-shelled creature with two large pincers, scuttles sideways along beaches and shallow waters, often hiding under rocks or burrowing into the sand.
memorable: Although not a significant threat, it can be a nuisance in large numbers or when disturbed.
goals: Survive in coastal regions by scavenging for food and avoiding predators.
relations: Crabs are often found in the company of other small aquatic creatures in coastal environments.
environment: Coastal regions, beaches, and shallow waters.
strengths: Amphibious nature allows survival in both water and air environments.
weaknesses: Extremely low hit points and poor physical attributes make it vulnerable in combat.
attacks: Claws attack deals 1 bludgeoning damage; can attach and deal ongoing damage while anchored.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to attach to a target, inflicting ongoing bludgeoning damage.
senses: Has keen senses within 30 feet, allowing detection of nearby creatures.
skills: Has a stealth score of 12, making it good at remaining undetected.
additional_information: Can breathe air and water due to its amphibious ability.
Weak physical attributes prevent effective combat engagement.
Can scuttle sideways, typical for crabs.
Not inherently aggressive but will snap at anything that gets too close.
Easily defeated and poses minimal threat to adventurers.
test_queries: tiny hard-shelled creature that scuttles sideways
small crab that can attach to targets
